properties.title: Luxurious Manhattan Penthouse with Skyline Views
properties.description: Experience luxury living at its finest in this stunning penthouse apartment featuring floor-to-ceiling windows with breathtaking city skyline views. This modern residence boasts premium finishes throughout, including hardwood floors, marble countertops, and state-of-the-art appliances. The open-concept living space is perfect for entertaining, while the master suite offers a private retreat with spa-like bathroom and walk-in closet.

properties.title: Charming Brooklyn Brownstone with Garden
properties.description: Step into this beautifully restored 19th-century brownstone that perfectly blends historic charm with modern amenities. Located in the heart of Prospect Heights, this home features original architectural details, high ceilings, and abundant natural light. The private garden provides a peaceful oasis in the city, perfect for outdoor dining and relaxation.

properties.title: Modern Soho Loft with Industrial Details
properties.description: Discover urban sophistication in this stunning Soho loft featuring soaring ceilings, exposed beams, and oversized windows that flood the space with natural light. The open floor plan creates seamless flow between living areas, while industrial elements like polished concrete floors and steel fixtures add character and charm.

properties.title: Elegant Upper East Side Townhouse
properties.address: 234 East 78th Street, Upper East Side, NY 10075
properties.description: Experience timeless elegance in this magnificent Upper East Side townhouse, featuring classic pre-war architecture and luxury finishes throughout. This rare find offers multiple floors of gracious living space, perfect for both intimate family moments and grand entertaining. The property includes a private garden and is located on one of the most coveted tree-lined streets.

properties.title: Contemporary Queens Villa with Pool
properties.description: Escape to your own private oasis in this stunning contemporary villa featuring a beautiful backyard pool and entertainment area. This modern home offers spacious living areas with an open concept design, perfect for family life and hosting guests. The property includes premium upgrades throughout and a two-car garage.

properties.title: Cozy East Village Studio Apartment
properties.address: 45 St. Marks Place, East Village, NY 10003
properties.description: Perfect starter home in the vibrant East Village! This well-designed studio maximizes every square foot with clever storage solutions and an efficient layout. The unit features high ceilings, large windows, and has been recently renovated with modern finishes. Located in the heart of one of NYC's most dynamic neighborhoods.

properties.title: Spacious Midtown West 2-Bedroom with Amenities
properties.description: Luxury living in the heart of Midtown West! This spacious 2-bedroom apartment offers modern finishes, abundant natural light, and access to world-class building amenities. The unit features an open kitchen with premium appliances, in-unit laundry, and stunning city views from multiple exposures.

properties.title: Historic Harlem Brownstone with Original Details
properties.description: Own a piece of New York history with this beautifully preserved Harlem brownstone. This property retains its original architectural charm while offering modern updates for comfortable living. The home features original moldings, hardwood floors, and period details that tell the story of this historic neighborhood.

properties.title: Luxury Financial District High-Rise with Harbor Views
properties.description: Wake up to stunning harbor views in this luxury Financial District apartment. This modern residence offers floor-to-ceiling windows, premium finishes, and access to exceptional building amenities. The location provides easy access to transportation, dining, and the waterfront, making it perfect for the urban professional.

properties.title: Trendy Williamsburg Loft with River Views
properties.description: Experience Brooklyn's coolest neighborhood in this stunning Williamsburg loft with breathtaking East River views. This converted industrial space features original brick walls, polished concrete floors, and an open layout perfect for modern living. The building offers rooftop access with Manhattan skyline views.

properties.title: Classic Upper West Side Pre-War Apartment
properties.address: 890 West End Avenue, Upper West Side, NY 10025
properties.description: Timeless elegance meets modern comfort in this classic Upper West Side pre-war apartment. Featuring high ceilings, original hardwood floors, and beautiful period details, this home offers the perfect blend of old-world charm and contemporary amenities. Located just blocks from Central Park and Lincoln Center.

properties.title: Modern Battery Park City Family Home
properties.address: 199 Battery Place, Battery Park City, NY 10280
properties.description: Perfect family sanctuary in the heart of Battery Park City. This modern townhouse offers spacious living across multiple levels with a private garden and garage parking. The home features contemporary finishes, abundant natural light, and is located in a family-friendly community with excellent schools and parks.
